name: Finding Serenity
description:
HINT - Don't run at people, stay still or back up and you wont get hit.

"You only get one season of Firefly" - Fox TV says to the world. One guy chose to look for answers in the only place he could.

Play this fast paced game of revenge and take the fight to those who deprived us of more Firefly.

This is a Ludum Dare 28 game made in 48 exhausting hours.

All music generated using http://www.abundant-music.com/ all graphics done within the 48 hours and all sound produced with my own voice of using BFxr.
